description: This file defines the interface and class declaration for DobbySpecGenerator, a class responsible for generating specifications for container runtime environments, including methods for creating environment variables, mounts, plugins, and configurations. It references external JSON processing, application configuration, runtime configuration, and AI configuration components.
external_methods: Json::Value createEnvVars(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createMounts(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createRdkPlugins(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createMinidumpPlugin() const
Json::Value createAppServiceSDKPlugin(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createNetworkPlugin(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createBindMount(const std::string&, const std::string&, unsigned long) const
bool shouldEnableGpu(const ApplicationConfiguration&) const
ssize_t getSysMemoryLimit(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
ssize_t getGPUMemoryLimit(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
bool getVpuEnabled(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
std::string getCpuCores()
void populateClassicPlugins(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&, Json::Value&)
Json::Value createEthanLogPlugin(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createMulticastSocketPlugin(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createIonMemoryPlugin() const
Json::Value createThunderPlugin(const ApplicationConfiguration&)
Json::Value createOpenCDMPlugin(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createPrivateDataMount(const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
void createFkpsMounts(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&, Json::Value&)
Json::Value createTmpfsMount(const std::string&, unsigned long) const
Json::Value createResourceManagerMount(const ApplicationConfiguration&)
Json::Value getWorkingDir(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
void initialiseIonHeapsJson()
std::string encodeURL(std::string) const
void addHolePunchPortToSpec(Json::Value&, in_port_t) const

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: This class provides methods to generate container specifications, including environment variables, mounts, plugins, and runtime configurations for a containerized application environment.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates the container specification JSON string based on application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates a JSON object representing environment variables for the container.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates a JSON object representing the mounts for the container.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for RDK plugins to be included in the container configuration.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for the minidump plugin.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for the Application Service SDK plugin.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for network configurations.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a bind mount JSON object for source and destination paths with specified options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines whether GPU should be enabled based on application configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves system memory limit based on configuration.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves GPU memory limit based on configuration.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) is enabled in configuration.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Retrieves CPU core information.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates the JSON specification with classic plugins setup.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for Ethan log plugin.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for multicast socket plugin.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for ion memory plugin.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for Thunder plugin based on application configuration.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for OpenCDM plugin.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates a mount point for private data.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates Fkps mounts within the specification.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates a temporary filesystem mount.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates a resource manager mount point.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Determines the working directory for the container.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes JSON configuration for ion heaps.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes a URL string.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds Hole Punch port to the JSON specification.
